import React, { useState } from "react" import { Col, Row, Card, CardBody, Button, Dropdown, DropdownMenu, DropdownItem, DropdownToggle, ButtonDropdown, CardTitle } from "reactstrap" //Import Breadcrumb import Breadcrumbs from "../../components/Common/Breadcrumb" const UiDropdown = () => { const [singlebtn, setSinglebtn] = useState(false) const [singlebtn1, setSinglebtn1] = useState(false) const [btnprimary1, setBtnprimary1] = useState(false) const [btnsecondary1, setBtnsecondary1] = useState(false) const [btnsuccess1, setBtnsuccess1] = useState(false) const [btnInfo1, setBtnInfo1] = useState(false) const [btnWarning1, setBtnWarning1] = useState(false) const [btnDanger1, setBtnDanger1] = useState(false) const [drp_primary1, setDrp_primary1] = useState(false) const [drp_secondary1, setDrp_secondary1] = useState(false) const [drp_success1, setDrp_success1] = useState(false) const [drp_info1, setDrp_info1] = useState(false) const [drp_warning1, setDrp_warning1] = useState(false) const [drp_danger1, setDrp_danger1] = useState(false) const [drp_secondary, setDrp_secondary] = useState(false) const [drp_secondary_lg, setDrp_secondary_lg] = useState(false) const [drp_secondary_sm, setDrp_secondary_sm] = useState(false) const [drp_secondary_sm1, setDrp_secondary_sm1] = useState(false) const [dropup1, setDropup1] = useState(false) const [drp_up11, setDrp_up11] = useState(false) const [drop_align, setDrop_align] = useState(false) const [info_dropup1, setInfo_dropup1] = useState(false) const [infodrp_up11, setInfodrp_up11] = useState(false) const [info_dropup111, setInfo_dropup111] = useState(false) const [infodrp_up1111, setInfodrp_up1111] = useState(false) return (
Single button dropdowns

Any single .btn{" "} can be turned into a dropdown toggle with some markup changes. Heres how you can put them to work with either{" "} <button>{" "} elements:

setSinglebtn(!singlebtn)} > Dropdown button{" "} Action Another action Something else here setSinglebtn1(!singlebtn1)} > Dropdown Link Action Another action Something else here Variant

The best part is you can do this with any button variant, too:

setBtnprimary1(!btnprimary1)} className="btn-group me-1 mt-2" > Primary Action Another action Something else here {" "} setBtnsecondary1(!btnsecondary1)} className="btn-group me-1 mt-2" > Secondary{" "} Action Another action Something else here {" "} setBtnsuccess1(!btnsuccess1)} className="btn-group me-1 mt-2" > Success Action Another action Something else here {" "} setBtnInfo1(!btnInfo1)} className="btn-group me-1 mt-2" > Info Action Another action Something else here {" "} setBtnWarning1(!btnWarning1)} className="btn-group me-1 mt-2" > Warning Action Another action Something else here {" "} setBtnDanger1(!btnDanger1)} className="btn-group me-1 mt-2" > Danger Action Another action Something else here
Split button dropdowns

The best part is you can do this with any button variant, too:

setDrp_primary1(!drp_primary1)} > Header Action Another Action Another Action
setDrp_secondary1(!drp_secondary1)} > Header Action Another Action Another Action
setDrp_success1(!drp_success1)} > Header Action Another Action Another Action
setDrp_info1(!drp_info1)} > Header Action Another Action Another Action
setDrp_warning1(!drp_warning1)} > Header Action Another Action Another Action
setDrp_danger1(!drp_danger1)} > Header Action Another Action Another Action
Sizing

{" "} Button dropdowns work with buttons of all sizes, including default and split dropdown buttons.

setDrp_secondary(!drp_secondary)} > Large button {" "} Action Another Action Another Action
{" "}
setDrp_secondary_lg(!drp_secondary_lg)} > Action Another Action Another Action
{" "}
setDrp_secondary_sm(!drp_secondary_sm)} > Small button {" "} Action Another Action Another Action
{" "}
setDrp_secondary_sm1(!drp_secondary_sm1)} > Action Another Action Another Action
Dropup variation

Trigger dropdown menus above elements by adding{" "} .dropup to the parent element.

setDropup1(!dropup1)} > Dropup Action Another action Something else here setDrp_up11(!drp_up11)} > Header Action Another Action Another Action
Menu alignment

Add{" "} .dropdown-menu-right {" "} to a{" "} .dropdown-menu to right align the dropdown menu.

setDrop_align(!drop_align)} > Menu is end-aligned{" "} Action Another Action Another Action Dropright variation

Trigger dropdown menus at the right of the elements by adding .dropright to the parent element.

setInfo_dropup1(!info_dropup1)} className="btn-group mt-2 me-1 dropend" > Dropright Action Another action Something else here {" "} setInfodrp_up11(!infodrp_up11)} className="btn-group mt-2 me-1 dropend" > Header Action Another Action Another Action
Dropleft variation

Trigger dropdown menus at the right of the elements by adding .dropleft to the parent element.

setInfo_dropup111(!info_dropup111)} className="btn-group mt-2 me-1 dropend" > Dropleft Action Another action Something else here {" "} setInfodrp_up1111(!infodrp_up1111)} className="btn-group mt-2 me-1 dropend" > Header Action Another Action Another Action
) } export default UiDropdown
